pages.text: So, you've gotten your hands on an incubator machine. But how do you use it?

First, place down your Incubator where ever you would like it to sit at. Then you can open the Incubator GUI by right-clicking the block.$(br2)In order to create gems you need gem essence, Chroma, an inactive gem base of your choosing, plus the cruxes required to grow that gem.

Each gem has a section in this GEM Incubation Guide that describes what its requirements are, including favored blocks and gem essence colors.$(br2)You may view these pages as you unlock them by picking up inactive gem bases.

You may also supplement the Incubator with additional items to aid in incubation, such as a prime booster or a speed booster. Please view the following pages to find the example image of how the incubator should be used.
When the Incubator is in use, please remember to fill ALL crux slots with material. It can be a mixture of a gem's preferred cruxes or just one type only, but ALL slots must be filled.
